# abacusBCA

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The abacusBCA package facilitates data access and basic processing of BC Assessment data hosted on UBC ABACUS for research purposes.

## Reference

[abacusBCA home page and reference guide](https://mountainmath.github.io/abacusBCA/index.html)

## Installation

You can install the latest version of abacusBCA from [GitHub](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("mountainmath/abacusBCA")
```

## Example

For example, to access the sales data from the 2021 data dump:

```{r example, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
library(abacusBCA)

sales_data <- get_bca_data("sales")
```
